title: Mumbai: ’Forced to withdraw case,’ claims 29-year-old woman after filing rape case against ex-corporator
selftext: Our great oligarchy. I won't pin it on a particular party, it's true for ever single group.
comments: That's the only thing we can do, to hope. We are basically incapable of offering her anything better.
I wonder what will the "both sides are bad" or "we don't have any other alternative" crowd say about this?
Reminds me of Salman's hit n run. The rich and powerful can get away with literally anything
Police cooperated with the politicians to screw up the case. If police claims there is no evidence, then the victim cannot do anything.
